description: Try our easy to follow Sausage, Ricotta and Roasted Vegetable Tortellini Bake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.

image.url: https://foodhub.scene7.com/is/image/woolworthsltdprod/Sausage_ Ricotta and Roasted Vegetable Tortellini Bake:Square-1300x1300

name: Sausage, Ricotta and Roasted Vegetable Tortellini Bake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 630g Leggo’s Ricotta and Roasted Vegetable Tortellini
4 good quality pork sausages, meat squeezed from the skins and broken into small chunks

recipeInstructions.text: Cook Leggo’s Ricotta and Roasted Vegetable Tortellini according to packet instructions. Drain and set aside.
Preheat a fan forced oven to 180oC.
Heat oil in a large frypan over medium heat. Add sausage pieces and cook until browned. Remove from heat, add garlic, chilli flakes (if using), lemon zest, baby spinach and tomatoes
Stir to coat then season to taste. Toss through the cooked pasta and transfer the mixture to a large oven-safe dish.
Mix breadcrumbs and cheese then spread over the top of the pasta. Bake for 20-25 mins or until cheese is golden. Serve immediately.
